column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=And the misinformation gets out there .

#Text=It gets out there because of Fox News , but it also gets out there because Obama does n't educate the people and if people knew that , he could change public opinion if he would just educate them to that .
#Text=But he does n't do it because he 's too timid .
#Text=His whole life has been one where he reaches consensus until he gets along .
#Text=He goes along and gets along .
#Text=He 's never had to take a hard stance or anything like that .
#Text=And that may be why he got elected .
#Text=It could be that the American people would have rejected him if he 'd been an assertive African American man who took hard stances on hard issues , and was very dogmatic .
#Text=And I think that 's unfortunate because some of a lot America might react that way .
#Text=Policy
#Text=Let 's get into policy a little more .
#Text=How can high energy costs be reduced ?
#Text=Well , the only way to do that is you 're going to have to try to find alternate sources of energy .
#Text=You 've got to make cars that are more fuel efficient .
#Text=You have to have homes that heat better , that are better insulated .
#Text=You have to get people to do the things that [ President ] Jimmy Carter told us to do 35 years ago .
#Text=If people started doing that more , it would be a lot better .
#Text=Now we 've already cut down on some of our energy consumption , but we definitely need to do it more .
#Text=I think that it 's a shame that gasoline costs as much as it does and it 's a shame that the oil companies have as much power as they do .
#Text=It 's a shame that Exxon made like 10 billion dollars in one quarter .
#Text=That 's just really pathetic , and they have all the power , all the tax breaks , all the lobbyists , all the political pull .
#Text=They 're growing bigger and bigger at our expense .

#Text=President Jimmy Carter , pictured in 1980 , remarked during a 1977 speech on energy policy that " we must prepare quickly for ... strict conservation and to the use of coal and permanent renewable energy sources , like solar power . "
#Text=He listed ten principles for a " national energy plan " .

column1: #Text=Image : Marion S. Trikosko .
#Text=One way to do it too would be to cut down .

#Text=I think there needs to be some sort of , on the energy futures and things like that , they need to really be careful that people are n't allowed to run up the price of oil through speculation like they did during 2008 .
#Text=There just was n't that much going on in the economy at that time .

#Text=We were sort of having the onset of a recession and the energy demand worldwide was falling in 2008 , yet the price of a barrel of oil went in March of 2008 to $ 48.00 to about $ 147.00 at the end of July .
#Text=So that sort of thing needs to be investigated and any sort of speculative activities that gives rise to that needs to be regulated .
#Text=I mean , there was no reason for it to triple like that .
